caption.p: a Schematic representation of the N-termini, the central globular domains, and the C-terminal tails of HLF1V (light blue) and HLF3l (light red) and the hybrid variants HLF-Hyb3a, HLF-Hyb3b, and HLF-Hyb3c. b Schematic representation of the N-termini, the central globular domains, and the C-terminal tails of HLF1V (light blue), HLF3 (light red), HLF4a (light green), and HLF4b (purple) and the hybrid variants HLF-Hyb4a, HLF-Hyb4b, HLF-Hyb4c, and HLF-Hyb4d
